page.title: 03INDUSTRY.
page.content: There are a variety of types of industry in the area both old and modern. Along Regent Road there is an {Enterprise Zone,}called{The Red Rose Centre.This is being organised by the government to help create jobs by offering lower taxes and rates to industrialists.The{jobs created}are in large wholesale warehouses e.g. carpets, shoes and D.I.Y. The Red Rose Centre is a different type of industrial place to the rest of the buildings in the area because the centre{does not}manufacture goods. The centre is just a wholesale place.The centre is a modern building. Along Liverpool Street there are a number of longer established manufacturing industries e.g. clothing manufacturers and an important feature is the{Gasworks.}These works supply
